item.description:
Friday, September 11th

The Herman's Hermits starring Peter Noone 9PM

Exit 12 on I-91 and 35 Minutes from Hartford CT. or from the Wilbur Cross Parkway, take Exit 63 and simply follow the signs. The Fairgrounds are located on Washington Ave. (Route 5) in North Haven, Connecticut.

Ample FREE parking on the Fair Grounds!

Admission:
General Admission just $9.00
Special Senior Citizen admission special on SUNDAY just $5.00
Children under 12 admitted free when accompanied by an adult.

Fair Hours

SEPTEMBER 4th - 7th

THURSDAY SEPT. 10TH 5:00PM TO 10:00PM
FRIDAY, SEPT. 11TH 3:00PM TO 11:00PM
SATURDAY, SEPT. 12TH 10:00AM TO 11:00PM
SUNDAY, SEPT. 13TH 10:00AM TO 8:00PM

North Haven Fair Web Site

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Herman's Hermits- North Haven Fair, Friday, Sept. 11, 2009
